scenario.description:
This scenario puts a fleet of ferries in San Francisco Bay near the San Francisco International Airport (KSFO).
The ferry fleet starts just east of the airport and proceeds on a northerly heading. Start on Runway 1R or 1L and you should see the ships just as you come off the end of the runway.
The ferries are air-to-ground targets, you can damage them with bombs or heavy guns.
When you bomb and shoot the ferries they will slow down, finally catch fire, and then stop completely (to see the smoke and fire you must have Particles enabled in View/Rendering Options).
To damage the ferries takes a direct hit from a machine gun or heavy gun, or a close strike by a heavy bomb. It generally takes many hits, even with bombs, to severely damage the ferries. The ferries are large, quite fast-moving, and quite difficult to kill with your available armament.
Install this scenario in the FlightGear/data/AI directory.
Any aircraft that shoots guns or drops bombs can damage the tanks. The Fairchild A-10 Thunderbolt is a great choice - http://wiki.flightgear.org/index.php/Fairchild_A-10
